<br />

The Levenberg-Marquardt Neuro sample applications show how to solve a variety of problems using neural networks and the [http://accord.googlecode.com/svn/docs/html/T_Accord_Neuro_Learning_LevenbergMarquardtLearning.htm Levenberg-Marquardt learning algorithm]. The applications have the option to use a Bayesian Regularization if desired.
